# HUD::END_TEXT_COMMAND_THEFEED_POST_VERSUS_TU

## Summary
Displays the MP Versus feed component used when you die in multiplayer

## Parameters
* **STRING** ch1TXD: Ped 1 Headshot TXD Ped 1 Headshot TXN
* **STRING** ch1TXN
* **INT** val1: Ped 1 value
* **STRING** ch2TXD: Ped 2 Headshot TXD Ped 2 Headshot TXN
* **STRING** ch2TXN
* **INT** val2: Ped 2 value
* **HUD_COLOURS** customColor1 = -1
* **HUD_COLOURS** customColor2 = -1

## Returns
* **INT**: A unique id which can be used to manipulate the item while on screen.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This function can show pictures of every texture that can be requested by REQUEST_STREAMED_TEXTURE_DICT.

List of picNames: https://pastebin.com/XdpJVbHz
HUD colors and their values: https://pastebin.com/d9aHPbXN

Shows a deathmatch score above the minimap, example: https://i.imgur.com/YmoMklG.png
